sourcesContent:
Listado de Cartas

Carta borrada:

  • {{card}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cartas-lista', templateUrl: './lista.component.html', styleUrls: ['./lista.component.css'] }) export class ListaComponent { public cartas:string[] = ['Broww, Huntsman of Dark World', 'Genta, Gateman of Dark World', 'Reign-Beaux, Overking of Dark World']; public deletedCard?:string; public removeLastItem():void{ this.deletedCard = this.cartas.pop(); } }
